text: Marshalling may refer to: ==Activity== * Marshalling (computer science) * Marshalling (heraldry) * Marshalling, the activity conducted in a railway marshalling yard * Aircraft marshalling * Motorsport marshaling * Marshalling, the switchgear in which the signals from the field instrumentation are collected before the connection to the DCS (grouping of I/O). ==Law== * Doctrine of Marshalling - an equitable concept in the law ==See also== * Marshal (disambiguation) * Marshall (disambiguation)
title: Marshalling
